com.solacesystems.jcsmp.impl.timers

Interface JCSMPTimerQueue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JCSMPTimerQueueImpl, SyncEventDispatcherReactor

    public interface JCSMPTimerQueue
    Timer Queue very loosely similar to ACE_Timer_Queue in the ACE framework. Allows synchronous dispatching of timeout events and fast scheduling and retrieval of timers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelAllTimers()
      Cancel all scheduled timers.
      void cancelTimer(JCSMPTimer timer)
      Cancel a specific timer.

    • Method Detail

      • schedule_absolute

        JCSMPTimer schedule_absolute(long time,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler)
        Schedule a timer for an absolute time in the future.
        Parameters:
        time - Absolute time at which the timer should expire (same format as returned by System.currentTimeMillis()).
        handler - Implementation of the JCSMPTimeoutHandler interface, to run on expiry.
        Returns:
        result

      • schedule_absolute

        JCSMPTimer schedule_absolute(long offset,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler,
                           JCSMPTimer timer)

      • schedule_relative

        JCSMPTimer schedule_relative(long offset,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler)
        Schedule a timer for a relative time in the future.
        Parameters:
        offset - Relative time offset (milliseconds).
        handler - Implementation of the JCSMPTimeoutHandler interface, to run on expiry.
        Returns:
        result

      • schedule_relative

        JCSMPTimer schedule_relative(long offset,
                           JCSMPTimeoutHandler handler,
                           JCSMPTimer timer)

      • cancelTimer

        void cancelTimer(JCSMPTimer timer)
        Cancel a specific timer. It is legal to attempt to cancel a timer not currently scheduled; such a call has no effect.
        Parameters:
        timer - Timer to cancel.

      • cancelAllTimers

        void cancelAllTimers()
        Cancel all scheduled timers. (Warning - Dangerous!)
